verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
In the quiet, in the stillness I know that you are God
In the secret of your presence I know there I am restored,
When you call I won't refuse
Each new day again I'll choose...

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
There is no one else for me,
None but Jesus,
Crucified to set me free,
Now I live to bring you Praise.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
In the chaos, in confusion I know youre sovereign still
in the moment of my weakness
You give me grace to do your will

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
When you call I wont delay
This my song through all my days..

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
All my delight is in you Lord
All of my hope,
All of my strength..
All my delight is in you Lord,
Forever more.
